verses.verse: For everything there is a season,<WH2165> and a time<WH2165> for every purpose<WH2656> under heaven:<WH8064>
a time<WH6256> to be born,<WH3205> and a time<WH6256> to die;<WH4191> a time<WH6256> to plant,<WH5193> and a time<WH6256> to pluck up<WH6131> that which is planted;<WH5193>
a time<WH6256> to kill,<WH2026> and a time<WH6256> to heal;<WH7495> a time<WH6256> to break down,<WH6555> and a time<WH6256> to build up;<WH1129>
a time<WH6256> to weep,<WH1058> and a time<WH6256> to laugh;<WH7832> a time<WH6256> to mourn,<WH5594> and a time<WH6256> to dance;<WH7540>

a time<WH6256> to cast away<WH7993> stones,<WH68> and a time<WH6256> to gather<WH3664> stones<WH68> together;<WH3664> a time<WH6256> to embrace,<WH2263> and a time<WH6256> to refrain<WH7368> from embracing;<WH2263>
a time<WH6256> to seek,<WH1245> and a time<WH6256> to lose;<WH6> a time<WH6256> to keep,<WH8104> and a time<WH6256> to cast away;<WH7993>
a time<WH6256> to tear,<WH7167> and a time<WH6256> to sew;<WH8609> a time<WH6256> to keep silence,<WH2814> and a time<WH6256> to speak;<WH1696>
a time<WH6256> to love,<WH157> and a time<WH6256> to hate;<WH8130> a time<WH6256> for war,<WH4421> and a time<WH6256> for peace.<WH7965>
What profit<WH3504> has he who works<WH6213> in that in which<WH834> he labors?<WH6001>
I have seen<WH7200> the burden<WH6045> which God<WH430> has given<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> to be afflicted with.<WH6031>

He has made<WH6213> everything beautiful<WH3303> in its time.<WH6256> He has also set<WH5414> eternity<WH5769> in their hearts,<WH3820> yet so that<WH1097> man<WH120> can't<WH4672> find out the work<WH4639> that<WH1097> God<WH430> has done from the beginning<WH7218> even to the end.<WH5490>
I know<WH3045> that there is nothing better<WH2896> for them than to rejoice,<WH8055> and to do<WH6213> good<WH2896> as long as they live.<WH2416>
Also that every man<WH120> should eat<WH398> and drink,<WH8354> and enjoy<WH7200> good<WH2896> in all his labor,<WH5999> is the gift<WH4991> of God.<WH430>

I know<WH3045> that whatever God<WH430> does,<WH6213> it shall be forever.<WH5769> Nothing<WH369> can be added<WH3254> to it,<WH1639> nor anything taken from it;<WH430> and God has done<WH6213> it,<WH3372> that men should fear before him.<WH6440>
That which is<WH3528> has been long ago,<WH3528> and that which is to be has been long ago: and God<WH430> seeks<WH1245> again that which is passed away.<WH7291>

Moreover I saw<WH7200> under the sun,<WH8121> in the place<WH4725> of justice,<WH4941> that wickedness<WH7562> was there;<WH4725> and in the place of righteousness,<WH6664> that wickedness was there.<WH7562>

I said<WH559> in my heart,<WH3820> "God<WH430> will judge<WH8199> the righteous<WH6662> and the wicked;<WH7563> for there is a time<WH6256> there for every purpose<WH2656> and for every work.<WH4639>"
I said<WH559> in my heart,<WH3820> "As for<WH1700> the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> God<WH430> tests<WH1305> them,<WH7200> so that they may see that they<WH1992> themselves are like animals.<WH929>

For that which happens<WH4745> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> happens<WH4745> to animals.<WH929> Even one thing<WH259> happens<WH4745> to them.<WH4194> As the one dies, so the other<WH2088> dies.<WH4194> Yes,<WH259> they have all one breath;<WH7307> and man<WH120> has no advantage<WH4195> over the animals:<WH929> for all is vanity.<WH1892>
All go<WH1980> to one<WH259> place.<WH4725> All are from the dust,<WH6083> and all turn<WH7725> to dust<WH6083> again.<WH7725>

Who knows<WH3045> the spirit<WH7307> of man,<WH1121> whether it goes<WH5927> upward,<WH4605> and the spirit<WH7307> of the animal,<WH929> whether it goes<WH3381> downward<WH4295> to the earth?<WH776>"

Therefore I saw<WH7200> that there is nothing better,<WH2896> than that a man<WH120> should rejoice<WH8055> in his works;<WH4639> for that is his portion:<WH2506> for who can bring<WH935> him to see<WH7200> what will be after him?<WH310>
